overview: Kitten Smith is the biggest country singer you’ve never heard of. Existing in his own imagination, he struggles to connect with others and the realities of his semi-vagrant lifestyle. But that hasn’t stopped him from pursuing his big dreams of becoming the next Hank Williams - performing to an audience of none in shopping malls, parking lots, and karaoke booths. That is until his music finally lands with one woman, Rose, who sees him for exactly who he is.
tagline: Kitten Smith is the biggest country singer you've never heard of.
title: Kitten
